link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 从多选菜单进行随机播放时偶尔崩溃
  2. 修复 在 Android 15 及其以上，设置向导的按钮被导航栏遮挡
  3. 修复 服务退出后自动媒体库刷新失败
  4. 优化 提升文件页中加载速度
  5. 优化 同步进度通知发送节流
  6. 修改 静音部分通知，更新通知渠道
  7. 更新 Kotlin 至 2.2.20, 更新依赖
  8. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: occasional crash when using 'shuffle all' from the multi-selection menu
  2. Fix: automatic library refresh failing once Service quits
  3. Fix: buttons in Startup Guide blocked by navigation bar on Android 15 and above
  4. Improve: accelerate loading speed in Files Tab
  5. Improve: throttle sync progress notifications
  6. Modify: mute some notifications, and update notification channels
  7. Development: upgrade Kotlin to 2.2.20, update dependencies
  8. Development: cleanup codes

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 流派页歌曲数量不正确
  2. 修复 路径过滤设置导入失败 (v1.11.0 起存在)
  3. 修复 从抽屉菜单处切换主题不完全
  4. 修复 在详情中读取超大嵌入图像的 VorbisComment 标签时崩溃或冻结
  5. 修复 在详情中提取嵌入图片失败
  6. 改进 在详情中显示文件日期
  7. 改进 增强“转到艺术家”菜单选项
  8. 翻译 更新 韩语 (7829hw) 和法语 (Clément Lyonnet)
  9. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: incorrect genre song count
  2. Fix: path filter settings importing failure (since v1.11.0)
  3. Fix: incompleted theme switching from drawer menu action
  4. Fix: crash or frozen when reading VorbisComment tag with large embed images in Detail
  5. Fix: extract embed artwork option not working in Detail
  6. Improve: display file dates in Detail
  7. Improve: enhance 'Go to artist' menu action
  8. Translation: update Korean (by 7829hw) and French (by Clément Lyonnet)
  9. Development: cleanup codes
